name: satryn
description:
an infinite twin stick shooty 


 8 fearsome baddies (not cuddly) 

 5 power-ups that will make you smile and say “i’m having fun”

 3 hazards that add to the chaotic nature of this strange place

 the love of your friends makes you stronger

satryn is completely free. if you enjoy your time with it, consider returning here to support development
